decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted 10th April 2017 and numbered 01/2017/01; 01/2017/02; 01/2017/03; 01/2017/04; 01/2017/05; 01/2017/06; 01/2017/07; 01/2017/08; 01/2017/09; 01/2017/10; Unnumbered Block Plan; Unnumbered Location Plan, therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.

Condition : 4 - Notwithstanding the provisions of The Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 and The Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) (Amendment) Order 2016 or any subsequent re-enactment thereof no development permitted under Schedule 2, Part 3, Class O of this order shall be undertaken without the consent of the Local Planning Authority obtained through submission of a planning application.
description: Conversion of the existing roofspace to include front and rear dormers incorporating six roof windows to create additional office space.
